availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Territory in the central western United States. Capital at Colorado City (1861–62) and Golden City (1862–67).

ab.bibl:
"An Act To Provide a Temporary Government for the Territory of Colorado", https://www.loc.gov/law/help/statutes-at-large/36th-congress/session-2/c36s2ch59.pdf.
"Golden, Colorado," USGS: Earth Explorer, accessed May 4, 2021, https://earthexplorer.usgs.gov/.
Michael D. Troyer, "Colorado Territory", Colorado Encyclopedia, accessed May 4, 2021, https://coloradoencyclopedia.org/article/colorado-territory.
